gov.noaa.pmel.sgt
Class PointAttribute

java.lang.Object
  gov.noaa.pmel.sgt.PointAttribute
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attribute, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class PointAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
implements Attribute, java.lang.Cloneable

Set the rendereing style for point data. Color, width, and mark type are PointAttribute properties.

Since:
1.0
Version:
$Revision$, $Date$
Author:
Donald Denbo
See Also:
CartesianGraph, PointCartesianRenderer, PlotMark, Serialized Form
